Module nstaley.inventorysystem

Package nstaley.inventorysystem

package nstaley.inventorysystem
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AddPartFormController
    This class is the controller for the add part screen in the inventory management system.
    AddProductFormController
    This class is the controller for the add product screen.
    InHouse
    This class is for creating parts that are made in house to be added to the inventory system.
    Inventory
    This class holds the list of parts and products and the methods to manipulate those lists.
    Main
    This class is the main class which loads the test data used, and launches the application.
    MainFormController
    This class is the controller for the main form of the inventory management system.
    ModifyPartFormController
    This Class is the controller for the modify part screen.
    ModifyProductFormController
    This class is the controller for the modify product screen.
    Outsourced
    This class is for creating parts that were made by another company.
    Part
     
    Product
    This class creates the product objects and includes an associated parts list of the parts included in the product.
